noun.description: An unintelligent or uneducated person; a fool, an idiot.

origin: Mid 18th century; earliest use found in Tim Bobbin (1708–1786), satirist and caricaturist (real name John Collier). Origin uncertain<br>early 19th century; earliest use found in John Farey (1766–1826), geologist and surveyor. Probably representing a regional pronunciation of gobbing.
